content: this is a timeless go-to sock pattern designed to let your favorite stripy or variegated yarn shine ✨ perfect for relaxing knitting gift socks or your everyday pair please note this is not a fully detailed pattern the pdf includes a chart and brief instructions to guide your project the chart is written for 3 sizes 62 66 70 sts and you can easily adjust the fit by changing your needle size or working fewer/more repeats
